WWWFORM73(YFORM,YART1,YLFN,NOY) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; SELECT DER MULTISELECTFELDER ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 21-Jan-2009 GRF Replace YRETVAL name (easier tracking) ; 01.06.2002 DT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW YY
SET YY="Y" IF $GET(NOY)=1 SET YY="" ;OHNE Y ;FIS;01.10.03 ;without SET YFORM = $GET(YFORM) SET YART1 = $GET(YART1) SET YLFN = $GET(YLFN) WRITE YCR,"<SCRIPT LANGUAGE = JavaScript>" WRITE YCR,"function MULTISELECT"_YART1_YLFN_"()" WRITE YCR,"{" WRITE YCR," var boxLength = document."_YHTMFORM_"."_YY_YFORM_YART1_YLFN_".length;" WRITE YCR," var fieldinput = "_""""_""""_" ;" WRITE YCR," var count = 0;" WRITE YCR," for (i = 0; i < boxLength; i++) " WRITE YCR," {" WRITE YCR," if (document."_YHTMFORM_"."_YY_YFORM_YART1_YLFN_".options[i].selected==true)" WRITE YCR," {" WRITE YCR," if (document."_YHTMFORM_"."_YY_YFORM_YART1_YLFN_".options[i].value != "_""""_""""_")" WRITE YCR," {" WRITE YCR," fieldinput = fieldinput + document."_YHTMFORM_"."_YY_YFORM_YART1_YLFN_".options[i].value + "_""""_";"_""""_";" WRITE YCR," }" WRITE YCR," }" WRITE YCR," count++;" WRITE YCR," }" WRITE YCR," return fieldinput;" WRITE YCR," }" WRITE YCR,"</script>" QUIT
VAR(YFORM,YART1,YLFN,NOY) ;FIS;AANHÃ„NGEN AN STRING;06.02.04 ;upon new strReturn,YY
SET YY="Y" IF $GET(NOY)=1 SET YY="" ;OHNE Y ;FIS;01.10.03 ;without SET YFORM = $GET(YFORM) SET YART1 = $GET(YART1) SET YLFN = $GET(YLFN) SET strReturn="" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_"<SCRIPT LANGUAGE = JavaScript>" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_"function MULTISELECT"_YART1_YLFN_"()" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_"{ " SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" var boxLength = document."_YHTMFORM_"."_YY_YFORM_YART1_YLFN_".length;" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" var fieldinput = "_""""_""""_" ;" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" var count = 0;" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" for (i = 0; i < boxLength; i++) " SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" {" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" if (document."_YHTMFORM_"."_YY_YFORM_YART1_YLFN_".options[i].selected==true)" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" {" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" if (document."_YHTMFORM_"."_YY_YFORM_YART1_YLFN_".options[i].value != "_""""_""""_")" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" {" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" fieldinput = fieldinput + document."_YHTMFORM_"."_YY_YFORM_YART1_YLFN_".options[i].value + "_""""_";"_""""_";" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" }" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" }" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" count++;" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" }" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" return fieldinput;" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_" }" SET strReturn = strReturn_YCR_"</script>" QUIT strReturn
